resources.string: Welcome to BenDroid! This is an app that gives you unobtrusive custom vibrations at your selected times to help you keep track of the time.
You will only see this screen once. Next time, this app will go straight to the settings pane.
This app will vibrate at a specified time interval like a grandfather clock. You can set how many times it \"chimes\" and when it does.
Control how strongly you want your phone to vibrate for each "chime"
Choose whether you want the device to vibrate once at each hour. If unselected, the device will vibrate the number of times the hour is (e.g. 9:00 will merit 9 "chimes")
If selected, device will ring with military time. Otherwise, there will be no differentiation between A.M. and P.M.

Whether you want the vibrations to be exactly at whichever time interval you choose. This is more accurate with respect to time. If unchecked, the device will vibrate at a general approximation of the interval.
Sends a notification with each vibration
BenDroid is running and will send notifications with the preferences set
BenDroid is not running and will not send vibrations or notifications
